FAQ.ai_point_a:
Every time the AI ​​model is called, a certain amount of AI points will be consumed. 
For specific calculation standards, please refer to the "AI Points Calculation Standards" above.

Token calculation uses the same formula as GPT3.5, 1Token≈0.7 Chinese characters≈0.9 English words. Continuous characters may be considered as 1 Tokens.
FAQ.ai_point_expire_a:
will expire. 
After the current package expires, the AI ​​points will be cleared and updated to the AI ​​points of the new package. 
The AI ​​points for the annual package last for 1 year, not every month.
FAQ.auto_renew_a: After the current package expires, the system will automatically renew according to the "future package" and the system will try to deduct the fee from the account balance. If you need to automatically renew, please reserve a quota in the account balance.
FAQ.auto_renew_q: Will the subscription package automatically renew?
FAQ.change_package_a:
When the current package price is greater than the new package, you cannot switch immediately. You will be switched in the form of "renewal" after the current package expires.

When the current package price is lower than the new package, the system will automatically calculate the remaining balance of the current package, and you can pay the price difference to switch packages.
FAQ.dataset_compute_a:
1 knowledge base storage is equal to 1 knowledge base index. 
A piece of knowledge base data can contain one or more knowledge base indexes. 
During enhanced training, 1 piece of data will generate 5 indexes.
FAQ.dataset_compute_q: How to calculate knowledge base storage?
FAQ.dataset_index_a:
Won't. 
However, when the knowledge base index exceeds, knowledge base content cannot be inserted and updated.
FAQ.dataset_index_q: Will the knowledge base index be deleted if it exceeds the limit?
FAQ.free_user_clean_a: After free version users (free version without purchasing additional packages) have no usage records for 30 days, the system will automatically clear all knowledge base content under the account.
FAQ.free_user_clean_q: Will the data in the free version be cleared?
FAQ.package_overlay_a:
OK. 
Each resource package purchased is independent and will be used stacked within its validity period. 
AI points will be deducted from the resource package that expires first.
FAQ.package_overlay_q: Can additional resource packs be stacked?

Name: Name

team_error.dataset_amount_not_enough: The number of knowledge bases has reached the upper limit~

token_error_code.403: Invalid login status, please log in again

user_error.bin_visitor_guest: You are currently a visitor and do not have permission to operate

error.too_many_request: Too many requests, please try again later.

jsonEditor.Parse error: JSON may be incorrect, please check carefully

speech.not support: Your browser does not support speech input

app.Api request desc: Access existing systems via API, or enterprise WeChat, Lark, etc.
app.Interval timer tip: Can be scheduled to execute applications
app.Make a brief introduction of your app: Give your AI app an introduction
app.Publish Confirm: Confirm to publish the app? It will immediately update the app status across all published channels.
app.Publish app tip: Once you publish your app, all distribution channels will immediately use that version
app.Question Guide Tip: After the conversation ends, it will generate 3 guiding questions.
app.Set a name for your app: Set a name for your app
app.Setting ai property: Click to configure AI model related properties
app.Share link desc: Share the link with other users, who can use it directly without logging in
app.Share link desc detail: You can directly share this model with other users for conversation, and the other party can directly start the conversation without logging in. Note, this feature will consume your account balance, please keep the link safe!
app.TTS Tip: After enabling, each conversation can use the voice playback function. Using this function may incur additional costs.

edit.Query extension background tip: Describe the scope of the current conversation to help the AI complete and expand the current question. The content filled in is usually for the assistant

app.no_app: There is no application yet, go and create one!

outLink.Iframe block title: Copy the Iframe below and add it to your website
outLink.Link block title: Copy the link below and open it in a browser
outLink.Script block title: Add the code below to your website

schedule.Default prompt placeholder: Default question when executing the app

share.Amount limit tip: A maximum of 10 groups can be created
share.Create link tip: Link created successfully. The share address has been copied, you can share it directly

tip.Add a intro to app: Come and give the app an introduction~
tip.chatNodeSystemPromptTip:
The model has a fixed guide word. By adjusting this content, you can guide the model in the chat direction. 
The content will be anchored at the beginning of the context. 
Variables can be selected via input/insert

If a knowledge base is associated, you can also use appropriate descriptions to guide the model when to call the knowledge base search. 
For example:

You are an assistant in the movie "Interstellar". When users ask about content related to "Interstellar", please search the knowledge base and answer based on the search results.
tip.variableTip:
You can ask the user to fill in some content as specific variables for this round of conversation before the conversation starts. This module is located after the opening guide.
Variables can be injected into other module string type inputs through the form of {{variable key}}, such as: prompt words, limiting words, etc.
tip.welcomeTextTip:
Send an initial content before each conversation starts. Supports standard Markdown syntax, additional tags available:
[Shortcut key]: User can click to send the question directly

tts.Test Listen Text: Hello, this is a voice test, if you can hear this sentence, it means the voice playback function is normal

whisper.Auto send tip: Automatically send after voice input is complete, no need to manually click the send button
whisper.Auto tts response tip: Questions sent via voice input will be responded to directly in voice form, please make sure the voice playback function is turned on.
whisper.Not tts tip: You have not turned on voice playback, this function cannot be used

chat.Audio Not Support: Device does not support audio playback
chat.Confirm to clear history: Confirm to clear the online chat history of this app? Records of sharing and API calls will not be cleared.
chat.Confirm to clear share chat history: Confirm to delete all chat history?
chat.Custom History Title Description: If set to empty, it will automatically follow the chat history.
chat.Feedback Modal Tip: Enter what you find unsatisfactory about the answer
chat.Mark Description:
The current marking function is in beta.

After adding a mark, you need to select a dataset to store the marking data. You can quickly mark questions and expected answers through this function to guide the model's response next time.

Currently, like other data in the dataset, the marking function is influenced by the model and does not guarantee 100% compliance with expectations after marking.

Marking data is only synchronized one-way with the dataset. If the dataset modifies the marking data, the log display of marking data cannot be synchronized
chat.Question Guide: Guess what you want to ask
chat.Select dataset Desc: Select a dataset to store the expected answer
chat.You need to a chat app: You do not have a usable app

error.Messages empty: API content is empty, text may be too long~
error.Select dataset empty: You did not select a dataset

feedback.Close User Like:
User expressed approval
Click to close this mark
feedback.No Content: User did not provide specific feedback content
feedback.Read User dislike:
User expressed disapproval
Click to view content

quote.Quote Tip: Only the actual quote content is displayed here. If the data is updated, it will not be updated in real-time here

response.module historyPreview: Record preview (only part of the content is displayed)

tip.leave page: Content has been modified, confirm to leave the page?

dataset.Delete Confirm: Confirm to delete this dataset? Data cannot be recovered after deletion, please confirm!
dataset.Empty Dataset Tips: No datasets yet, go create one!
dataset.Name: Dataset name
dataset.Query extension intro: Enabling the question optimization feature can improve the accuracy of dataset searches during continuous dialogue. After enabling this feature, AI will complete missing information based on conversation records when searching the dataset.

collection.Start Sync Tip: Confirm to start syncing data? Old data will be deleted and re-acquired, please confirm!

data.Auxiliary Data Placeholder: This part is optional, usually to complement the data content above to build structured prompt words for special scenarios, up to {{maxToken}} characters.
data.Auxiliary Data Tip:
This part is optional
This content is usually to complement the data content above to build structured prompt words for special scenarios
data.Data Content Placeholder: This input box is mandatory, the content is usually a description of the knowledge point or a user's question, up to {{maxToken}} characters.
data.Data Content Tip:
This input box is mandatory
The content is usually a description of the knowledge point or a user's question.
data.Default Index Tip: Cannot be edited, the default index will use the text of the related data content and auxiliary data to generate the index directly.
data.Empty Tip: This collection has no data yet~

dataset.embedding model tip:
The index model can convert natural language into vectors for semantic retrieval.
Note, different index models cannot be used together, once you select an index model, it cannot be changed.

error.Data not found: Data does not exist or has been deleted
error.invalidVectorModelOrQAModel: Invalid vector model or QA model

import.Auto mode Estimated Price Tips: Requires calling the file processing model, consuming more Tokens: {{price}} points/1k Tokens
import.Auto process desc: Automatically set segmentation and preprocessing rules
import.Chunk Split Tip: Segment the text according to certain rules and convert it into a format that can be semantically searched, suitable for most scenarios. Does not require calling additional models for processing, low cost.
import.Custom split char Tips: Allows you to segment based on a custom delimiter. Usually used for pre-processed data, using a specific delimiter for precise segmentation.
import.Custom text desc: Manually enter a text as a dataset
import.Embedding Estimated Price Tips: Only using the index model, consumes a small amount of AI points: {{price}} points/1k Tokens
import.Ideal chunk length Tips: Segment according to the end symbol, and combine the segments into a block. This value determines the estimated size of the block.
import.Import success: Import successful, please wait for training
import.Link name placeholder:
Only supports static links, if the data is empty after upload, the link may not be readable
One per line, up to 10 links at a time
import.Local file desc: Upload PDF, TXT, DOCX, etc. files
import.QA Estimated Price Tips: Requires calling the file processing model, consuming more AI points: {{price}} points/1k Tokens
import.QA Import Tip: According to certain rules, split the text into a larger paragraph, call AI to generate Q&A pairs for that paragraph. Has very high search accuracy, but loses a lot of content details.
import.Web link desc: Read static web page content as a dataset

search.Max Tokens Tips: Maximum number of Tokens per search, approximately 1 Chinese character = 1.7 Tokens, 1 English character = 1 Token
search.Min Similarity Tips: Different index models have different similarities, please choose the appropriate value through search testing. When using ReRank, the similarity may be very low.
search.No support similarity: Supports similarity filtering only when using result reranking or semantic retrieval
search.ReRank desc: Use the reranking model for secondary sorting to enhance the overall ranking.

mode.embedding desc: Use vectors for text relevance queries
mode.fullTextRecall desc: Use traditional full-text retrieval, suitable for finding some keywords and special subject-predicate data
mode.mixedRecall desc: Return the combined results of vector retrieval and full-text retrieval, sorted using the RRF algorithm.

score.embedding desc: Obtain scores by calculating the distance between vectors, ranging from 0 to 1.
score.fullText desc: Calculate the score of the same keywords, ranging from 0 to infinity.
score.reRank desc: Calculate the relevance between sentences using the ReRank model, ranging from 0 to 1.
score.rrf desc: Merge multiple search results by inverted calculation.

test.Test Text Placeholder: Enter the text to be tested
test.test result placeholder: Test results will be displayed here
test.test result tip:
Sort based on the similarity between the knowledge base content and the test text. You can adjust the corresponding text according to the test results.
Note: The data in the test record may have been modified, clicking on a test data will display the latest data.

training.Auto mode Tip: Increase the semantic richness of data blocks by generating related questions and summaries through sub-indexes and model calls, which is more conducive to retrieval. Requires more storage space and increases AI call frequency.

website.Config Description: The Web site sync feature allows you to fill in a website's base URL, and the system will automatically crawl related web pages for knowledge base training. Only static sites will be crawled, mainly project documentation and blogs.
website.Confirm Create Tips: Confirm to sync this site, the sync task will start subsequently, please confirm!
website.Confirm Update Tips: Confirm to update the site configuration? It will start syncing immediately according to the new configuration, please confirm!
website.UnValid Website Tip: Your site may be a non-static site and cannot be synced

module.Default value placeholder: If not filled, the default return is an empty string

QueryExtension.placeholder:
For example:
Introduction and usage of python.
The current conversation is related to the game 'GTA5'.

extract.Enum Description: List possible values for the field, one per line
extract.Required Description: Even if the field cannot be extracted, the default value will be returned

http.Url and params have been split: Path parameters have been automatically added to Params
http.curl import placeholder: Please enter curl format content, the request information of the first interface will be extracted.

description.Background: You can add some specific content introductions to better identify the user's question type. This content is usually to introduce something unknown to the model.
description.HTTP Dynamic Input: Receives the output value of the previous node as a variable, which can be used by HTTP request parameters.
description.Http Request Header:
Custom request headers, please strictly fill in JSON strings.
1. Ensure there is no comma after the last property
2. Ensure key includes double quotes
For example: {"Authorization":"Bearer xxx"}
description.Http Request Url: New HTTP request URL. If there are two 'request URLs', you can delete this module and re-add it to pull the latest module configuration.
description.Response content:
Can use \n to achieve continuous line breaks.
Can be overridden by external module input. If non-string type data is passed in, it will be automatically converted to string

placeholder.Classify background:
For example: 
1. AIGC (Artificial Intelligence Generated Content) refers to the use of artificial intelligence technology to automatically or semi-automatically generate digital content, such as text, images, music, videos, etc.
2. AIGC technology includes but is not limited to natural language processing, computer vision, machine learning, and deep learning. These technologies can create new content or modify existing content to meet specific creative, educational, entertainment, or informational needs.

description.Ai response content: Triggered after the stream response is complete
description.New context: Concatenate this response content with historical records to return as a new context
description.query extension result: Outputs as an array of strings, can directly connect this result to 'Knowledge base search' 'User question', it is recommended not to connect to 'AI dialogue' 'User question'

template.AI response switch tip: If you wish the current node not to output content, you can turn off this switch. AI output content will not be displayed to the user, you can manually use 'AI response content' for special processing.
template.AI support tool tip: Supports function calls model, can better use tool invocation.

module.variable_update_info: You can update the output value of the specified node or update global variables

plugin.Http plugin intro placeholder: For display only, no actual effect

workflow.Change input type tip: Changing the input type will clear the filled values, please confirm!
workflow.Check Failed: Workflow validation failed, please check if the nodes are correctly filled and the connections are normal
workflow.Confirm stop debug: Confirm to stop debugging? Debugging information will not be preserved.

publish.OnRevert version: Click to revert to this version
publish.OnRevert version confirm: Confirm to revert to this version? It will save the configuration of the version being edited and create a new published version for the reverted version.

dataset.Confirm to delete the file: Confirm to delete the file and all its data?
dataset.Manual collection Tip: Manual collections allow you to create an empty container to store data
dataset.Select Dataset Tips: Only datasets from the same index model can be selected

collections.Confirm to delete the folder: Confirm to delete the folder and all its contents?

dataset.deleteFolderTips: Confirm to delete this folder and all the datasets it contains? Once deleted, data cannot be recovered. Please confirm!

get_laf_failed: Failed to get Laf function list

info.csv_download: Click to download batch test template
info.csv_message: Read the first column of the CSV file for batch testing, supporting up to 100 sets of data at a time.
info.felid_message: The field key must be pure English letters or numbers, and cannot start with a number.
info.free_plan: When a free version user does not log in to the system for 30 consecutive days, the system will automatically clean up the account knowledge base.
info.include: Includes standard package and additional resource package
info.node_info:
Adjusting this module will have an impact on the timing of tool calls.

You can guide the model to make tool calls by accurately describing the function of the module.
info.old_version_attention:
If it is detected that your advanced arrangement is an old version, the system will automatically format it into a new version of the workflow for you.


Due to large version differences, some workflows may not be arranged normally. Please reconnect the workflows manually. 
If the error persists, try deleting the corresponding node and adding it again.


You can directly click Debug to perform workflow testing, and click Publish after debugging is completed. 
The new workflow will not actually save and take effect until you click Publish.


Autosave will not take effect until you publish the new workflow.
info.open_api_notice:
You can fill in the relevant secret key of OpenAI/OneAPI. 
If you fill in this content, the online platform will use [AI Dialogue], [Problem Classification] and [Content Extraction] to retrieve the Key you filled in, and no charges will be made. 
Please pay attention to whether your Key has permission to access the corresponding model. 
The GPT model can choose FastAI.
info.open_api_placeholder:
Request address, default is openai official. 
The forwarding address can be filled in, but "v1" is not automatically completed.

no_laf_env: The system is not configured with Laf environment

pay.other: For other amounts, please round up the whole number
pay.wechat: Please scan the QR code on WeChat to pay:

permission.No InheritPermission: The permission has been restricted, and the parent folder's permission will not be inherited,
permission.Remove InheritPermission Confirm: This operation will cause to lose the current permission settings, whether to continue?
permission.Resume InheritPermission Confirm: Whether to resume to inherit the parent folder's permission?
permission.change_owner_tip: Your permissions will not be retained after transfer

openapi.New api key tip: Please keep your key safe, it will not be shown again~

outlink.Delete link tip: Confirm to delete this no-login link? After deletion, the link will immediately become invalid, but the conversation logs will still be retained, please confirm!
outlink.Max usage points tip: The maximum points this link can use. Exceeding this limit will make the link unusable. -1 means unlimited.

share.Response Quote tips: Return quote content in the share link, but will not allow users to download the original document

limit.No permission rerank: No permission to use result rerank, please upgrade your plan

user.Go laf env: Click to go to {{env}} to get the PAT credential.
user.Laf account course: View the tutorial for binding laf account.
user.Laf account intro: After binding your laf account, you will be able to use laf modules in the workflow to write code online.

login.Policy tip: Using represents your agreement to our
login.Root password placeholder: Root password is the environment variable you set
login.can_not_login: Unable to log in, click to contact

wallet.Not sufficient: Your AI points are insufficient, please upgrade your plan or buy additional AI points before continuing.

subscription.AI points click to read tip: Each call to the AI model will consume a certain amount of AI points (similar to Tokens). Click to view detailed calculation rules.
subscription.AI points usage tip: Each call to the AI model will consume a certain amount of AI points. The specific calculation standard can be referred to the 'Pricing standard' above
subscription.Extra plan tip: When the standard plan is not enough, you can buy extra resource packs to continue using
subscription.Sub plan tip: Free use of {{title}} or upgrade to a higher plan

standardSubLevel.free desc: Basic functions can be used for free every month, and the knowledge base will be cleared if there is no usage record for 30 days

subscription.token_compute: Click to view the online Tokens calculator

template.Quote Prompt Tip:
You can use {{quote}} to insert the quote content template, and use {{question}} to insert the question. Here are the default values:
{{default}}

undefined_var: An undefined variable is referenced. Is it automatically added?

user.Invite url tip:
Friends registered through this link will be permanently bound to you, and you will receive a certain balance reward when they recharge.
In addition, you will immediately receive a 5 yuan reward when friends register with a phone number.
The reward will be sent to your default team.
user.Promotion rate tip: You will receive a certain percentage of balance reward when your friend recharges
user.password_message: Password must be at least 4 characters and at most 60 characters

team.Invite Member Failed Tip: An error occurred while inviting members
team.Invite Member Tips: The invitee can access or use other resources within the team
team.Over Max Member Tip: Maximum of {{max}} members in the team
team.Processing invitations Tips: You have {{amount}} team invitations to process
team.Remove Member Confirm Tip: Confirm to remove {{username}} from the team? All their resources will be transferred to the team creator's account.
team.Team Tags Async Success: Link error corrected, tag information updated
